Jesse_Hunter:
{{short description|American singer-songwriter}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Jesse Hunter | image = | caption = | image_size = | birth_name = Billy Ray Dungy II{{cite web | url=https://repertoire.bmi.com/Search/Catalog?num=ycjPJeswfIfLHqQokoAC2A%253d%253d&cae=96FTkrOpb8J0AevHN%252fXoeQ%253d%253d&partType=WriterList&search=%7B%22Main_Search_Text%22%3A%22long%20legged%20hannah%20from%20butte%20montana%22%2C%22Sub_Search_Text%22%3Anull%2C%22Main_Search%22%3A%22Title%22%2C%22Sub_Search%22%3Anull%2C%22Search_Type%22%3A%22all%22%2C%22View_Count%22%3A100%2C%22Page_Number%22%3A0%2C%22Part_Type%22%3Anull%2C%22Part_Id%22%3Anull%2C%22Part_Id_Sub%22%3Anull%2C%22Part_Name%22%3Anull%2C%22Part_Cae%22%3Anull%2C%22Original_Search%22%3Anull%2C%22DisclaimerViewed%22%3Anull%7D&resetPageNumber=True&partIdSub=YO0HedHMatLb45JzS23DVw%253d%253d | title=Results for Dungy, Billy Ray | publisher=[[Broadcast Music Incorporated]] | accessdate=June 25, 2022}} | birth_place =[[Shelby County, Tennessee]], U.S. | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1959|1|14}}{{cite book|last=Whitburn|first=Joel|title=Hot Country Songs 1944 to 2008|publisher=Record Research, Inc|year=2008|pages=198|isbn=978-0-89820-177-2}} | origin = | instrument = Vocals | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = Singer | years_active = 1994-present | label = [[BNA Records|BNA]] }} '''Billy Ray Dungy II''' (born January 14, 1959), known professionally as '''Jesse Hunter''', is an American [[country music]] artist. Hunter signed to [[BNA Records]] in 1994, the same year that he released his [[Barry Beckett]]-produced debut album ''A Man Like Me''.{{cite web |url=http://nl.newsbank.com/nl-search/we/Archives?p_product=DM&p_theme=dm&p_action=search&p_maxdocs=200&p_topdoc=1&p_text_direct-0=0ED3D443C14A9B6A&p_field_direct-0=document_id&p_perpage=10&p_sort=YMD_date:D&s_trackval=GooglePM |title=The Class of '94 |accessdate=2008-09-03 |last=Corcoran |first=Michael |date=1994-02-17 |work=[[The Dallas Morning News]]}} The album produced three chart [[single (music)|singles]] in "Born Ready," "The Way She's Lookin'" and "Long Legged Hannah (From Butte, Montana)," his highest-charting single at No. 42 on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Country Songs]] charts. "Born Ready" and "Long Legged Hannah" also charted on the ''[[RPM (magazine)|RPM]]'' country charts in Canada. Michael Hight of ''New Country'' magazine gave Hunter's debut album a three-and-a-half star rating out of five, comparing his voice to [[Johnny Cash]]'s and saying "the renegade nature[…]positions him as a [[folk hero]] who has lived and learned and is ready to talk about it."{{cite journal|last=Hight|first=Michael|date=May 1994|title=Album reviews — Jesse Hunter, ''A Man Like Me''|journal=New Country|volume=1|issue=3|pages=59–60|issn=1074-536X}} Dungy has not recorded professionally since. As of 2021, he resides in [[Watertown, Tennessee]], and has written local theatre productions.{{cite web | url=https://www.wilsonpost.com/community/musician-billy-dungy-writes-play-for-watertown-high-theatre-group/article_d5aca2b2-35b4-11ec-9daf-373f5413ba83.html | title=Musician Billy Dungy writes play for Watertown High theatre group | publisher=Wilson Post | accessdate=June 25, 2022}} ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! style="width:10em;"| Title ! style="width:18em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row"| ''A Man Like Me'' | * Release date: April 26, 1994 * Label: [[BNA Records]] * Formats: [[Compact disc|CD]], [[Compact cassette|cassette]] |- |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:22em;"| Single ! colspan="2"| Peak chart
